sources.title: The chinese tea-set
sources.description:
Musical comedy. 1913 Russia celebrates the 300th anniversary of the Romanov dynasty. The steamship "St. Nicholas" sails along the Volga to Nizhny Novgorod - the center of the holiday. On board there is a respectable audience: businessmen, industrialists, princes... Everyone is having fun. The rich merchant Frol Satanovsky plays poker with other merchants, not suspecting that seasoned card sharpers are sitting at the same table with him, and the game is a well-performed performance. The adventurous search for the main swindler begins!

Year of production: 1999

Director: Moskalenko Vitaly
Screenwriter: Moskalenko Vitaly
Composer: Dmitry Smirnov
Operator: Nevsky Yuri
Production designer: Svetlana Sosnina

Cast: Nikonenko Sergey, Menshov Vladimir, Yankovsky Oleg, Mortar Bogdan, Bezrukov Sergey, Gabrielyan Sergey, Samokhina Anna, Slobodenyuk Yuri, Volkov Ivan, Dmitrieva Evgenia, Rezalin Alexander, Davydov Andrey, Dumchev Yuri, Episkoposyan Vladimir, Zhumabaev Dalon, Kupriyanov Vasily , Lagashkin Maxim, Bezrukova (Livanova) Irina, Parseev Alan, Revenko Alexander, Regner Igor, Rubeko Sergey, Stulova Ekaterina, Tan Lan, Firsov Vladimir
